content.en: Solar radiation prediction: Researchers have been investigating the use of artificial intelligence algorithms to improve the prediction of solar radiation. These algorithms, such as neuro-fuzzy techniques and machine learning models, have shown promising results in accurately estimating solar radiation in different regions and climates. The findings suggest that these advanced algorithms outperform conventional methods and provide more reliable predictions, which could have significant implications for renewable energy planning and management.
content.da: Forudsigelse af solstråling: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af kunstige intelligensalgoritmer for at forbedre forudsigelsen af solstråling. Disse algoritmer, såsom neuro-fuzzy-teknikker og maskinlæringsmodeller, har vist lovende resultater i præcist at estimere solstråling i forskellige regioner og klimaer. Resultaterne tyder på, at disse avancerede algoritmer overgår konventionelle metoder og leverer mere pålidelige forudsigelser, hvilket kan have betydelige konsekvenser for planlægning og styring af vedvarende energi.
